description: My place is close to Murray's Cheese Shop, Washington Square Park, Bleeker Street, SoHo, West Village. You’ll love my place because of the light, the kitchen, the coziness, the comfy bed, and the high ceilings. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.
name: Perfect, Sunny, Spotless, WV Studio
review: We had a great stay at Jay's place. Apartment was small, but we did not need much space, and it had everything we needed. Also the location in the west village was excellent.
